auto-focus.description: Whether or not to autofocus the first focusable element of Modal
auto-focus.description_zh: 是否自动聚焦 Modal 第一个可聚焦的元素

block-scroll.description: Whether to disable body scrolling when on
block-scroll.description_zh: 是否在打开时禁用 body 滚动

close-on-esc.description: Whether to close Modal when you press the Esc key
close-on-esc.description_zh: 是否在摁下 Esc 键的时候关闭 Modal

display-directive.description: What commands are used to control conditional rendering of the modal body
display-directive.description_zh: 使用何种指令控制模态框主体的条件渲染

mask-closable.description: Whether or not to emit an 'update:show' event when the mask is clicked
mask-closable.description_zh: 点击遮罩时是否发出 `update:show` 事件

preset.description: What preset to use for the modal

v-model:show.description: Whether or not to show Modal

to.description: The mount location of the modal

transform-origin.description: The location where the modal animation appears
transform-origin.description_zh: 模态框动画出现的位置

trap-focus.description: Whether to lock the focus inside the Modal
trap-focus.description_zh: 是否将焦点锁定在 Modal 内部

events.name: after-enter
events.description: Callbacks after the occurrence of Modal

events.name: esc
events.description: A callback for pressing the Esc key while the focus is inside the modal
events.description_zh: 焦点在 Modal 内部时按下 Esc 键的回调

events.name: mask-click
events.description: The callback when the mask is clicked

events.name: update:show
events.description: The modal updates the callback of whether to display the status
events.description_zh: 模态框更新是否展示状态的回调
